Lore: "What was that?" The Jedi power known as "affect mind" is often used to create minor distractions, allowing Jedi to elude enemies rather than engage them in battle.
Gametext: Plays on table. Bad Feeling Have I is canceled. Unless Inner Strength on table, opponent may use only one combat card per turn. Let Them Make The First Move may target only Undercover spies and R2-D2
Counterpart: I Find Your Lack Of Faith Disturbing (V)

Lore: Death Star troopers on sentry duty observe and direct incoming starships and monitor other critical sites. They perform sensor scans for life forms and weapons.
Gametext: Plays on table. Colo Claw Fish is canceled. Opponent must first use X Force to deploy a non-unique card (except a Jawa) to a location, where X = the number of copies of that card at that location.

CardName: I Find Your Lack Of Faith Disturbing (V)
Lore: Darth Vader ruthlessly used the Force to strike down enemies and soldiers who displeased him. He could choke victims from afar without touching them.
Gametext: Plays on table. Goo Nee Tay is canceled. Unless Deep Hatred on table, opponent may use only one combat card per turn. We'll Handle This may target only Undercover spies and 5D6-RA-7.

Lore: Rebel sentries are stationed on raised sensor platforms. On watch for Imperial scouts and other hazards, they supplement data gathered by Yavin Base's main sensors.
Gametext: Plays on table. Colo Claw Fish is canceled. Opponent must first use X Force to deploy a non-unique card (except a Jawa or Tusken Raider) to a location, where X = the number of copies of that card at that location.

Lore: "Give yourself to the dark side. It is the only way you can save your friends."
Gametext: Plays on table. If an 'insert' card was just inserted or revealed, it is canceled. You lose no Force to Boonta Eve Podrace. While you occupy more battlegrounds than opponent, I Did It! is suspended.
Information: This virtual slip may also be used on the Death Star II Uncommon
Cancels: any 'insert' card:\par 3,720 to 1\par A Disturbance In The Force\par A Tremor In The Force\par Access Denied\par Anger, Fear, Aggression\par Knowledge And Defense\par Never Tell Me The Odds\par Restricted Access

Lore: Imperial officers aboard the Death Star considered the Rebellion a minor threat.
Gametext: Plays on table. In order to play an Interrupt from Lost Pile, opponent must first stack it here (if possible) and use +1 Force for each card here, even if Interrupt is normally free. Revolution is canceled.

Lore: The Boonta Eve crowds are always looking for new and exciting developments at every Podrace.
Gametext: Plays on table. Ice Storm, Lost In The Wilderness, Order To Engage, Sandwhirl, and Scramble are canceled. Once per game, may take into hand from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) an Immediate Effect. Unless opponent occupies a battleground system, Staging Areas is suspended.
Pulls: After Her!\par Alert My Star Destroyer!\par All Too Easy\par Breached Defenses\par Cane Adiss\par Despair\par Energy Walls\par Enter The Bureaucrat\par Frozen Dinnerg\par High Anxiety\par I Am Your Father\par Imperial Propaganda\par Lost In Space\par Mostly Armless\par Mournful Roar\par Pride Of The Empire\par Qui-Gon's End\par Tentacle\par There'll Be Hell To Pay
Cancels: Ice Storm\par Lost In The Wilderness\par Sandwhirl\par Order To Engage\par Scramble\par Suspends Staging Areas while opponent occupies no battleground systems.
Information: This virtual slip may also be used on the Tatooine Common\par \par Re-released in Virtual Set 12 "Tweak Set". Original text:\par Plays on table. Cancels Order To Engage and Scramble. Once per game, may take into hand from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) an Immediate Effect. While opponent occupies no battleground systems, Staging Areas is suspended. "Missing" on Lost In The Wilderness is treated as "landspeed = 0 for remainder of turn."

Lore: The Jedi won't tolerate silly behavior for very long.
Gametext: Plays on table. Always Thinking With Your Stomach, Ice Storm, and Sandwhirl are canceled. Once per game, may take into hand from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) an Immediate Effect. Unless opponent occupies a battleground system, Mobilization Points is suspended.
Pulls: A Gift\par A Vergence In The Force\par Advantage\par At Peace\par Descent Into The Dark\par Disarming Creature\par \Energy Walls\par Grappling Hook\par Heroic Sacrifice\par I Can't Believe He's Gone\par Imperial Atrocity\par Legendary Starfighter\par The Time For Our Attack Has Come\par They Win This Round\par Weapon Of A Fallen Mentor\par What Was It?\par What're You Tryin' To Push On Us?

Once per game, may take into hand from Reserve Deck (reshuffle) an Immediate Effect. While opponent occupies no battleground systems, Mobilization Points is suspended. "Missing" on Always Thinking With Your Stomach is treated as "landspeed = 0 for remainder of turn."

Gametext: Plays on table. While you have 12 or fewer cards in hand, opponent may not remove cards from your hand (except with Monnok). Once per turn (even at start of turn), target a [Coruscant] Politcal Effect; it is suspended for the remainder of the turn.
Rules: AR Update November 3, 2016\par This Defensive Shield protects against attempts to remove cards from a player's hand (such as Defensive Fire, Scanning Crew, or I Will Make It Legal) and also against attempts to force you to lose specific cards from hand (such as with M'iiyoom Onith). It does not protect against cards like Fear that could require you to lose Force from hand.

Gametext: Plays on table. While you occupy a battleground and opponent occupies less than two battlegrounds, cancel opponent's Force drains at non-battleground locations and opponent's Force retrieval.
Information: Original card: You Will Take Me To Jabba Now
Cancels: Opponent's Force drains at non-battlegrounds\par Opponent's Force retrieval

Lore: Luke knew that while the dark side was quicker and more seductive, eventually evil would turn on itself.
Gametext: Plays on table. Scanning Crew is canceled. If an 'insert' card was just inserted or revealed, it is canceled. You lose no Force to Boonta Eve Podrace. While you occupy three battlegrounds, Watto's Box is suspended.
Information: This virtual slip may also be used on the Death Star II Uncommon

Gametext: Plays on table. While you have 12 or fewer cards in hand, opponent may not remove cards from your hand (except with Grimtaash).  Once per turn (even at start of turn), target a [Coruscant] Political Effect; it is suspended for the remainder of the turn.
Rules: AR Update November 3, 2016\par This Defensive Shield protects against attempts to remove cards from a player's hand (such as Defensive Fire, Scanning Crew, or I Will Make It Legal) and also against attempts to force you to lose specific cards from hand (such as with M'iiyoom Onith). It does not protect against cards like Fear that could require you to lose Force from hand.

Gametext: Plays on table. For opponent to deploy a character, starship, or vehicle for free (except by that card's own game text), opponent must first use 2 Force.
Plays on table. For opponent to deploy a character, starship, or vehicle for free (except by that card's own game text), opponent must first use 2 force.
Information: Original card: The Professor\par \par Primarily this card is designed to hinder (not kill) these strategies:\par \par Blizzard 4 pulling Vader\par Free Executor\par Free Maul to the Landing site\par Jabba's Space Cruiser reacts\par -----\par Good against the Watto-Objective No Money, No Parts, No Deal! / You're A Slave?\par -----\par Legacy Player Created Card\par Original concept by Michael Pistone, Kashyyyk Regional Winner 2004.

Lore: Han was not sure if Lando had forgiven him for winning the \ul Millennium Falcon\ul0. As the old gamblers' saying about sabacc goes: "Win the game, lose a friend."
Gametext: Plays on table. Cancels A Dangerous Time and Imperial Supply. Each player may play only one card with "sabacc" in title each turn. You may cancel an opponent's card with "sabacc" in title by losing 1 Force from hand.
